entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI iOS looking for obfuscar imeplementation doesn't works #25636
  • Picker ItemDisplayBinding doesn't support MVVM properly #25634
  • Collection View not populating with Observable Collection in Android #25633
  • [iOS] UseSafeArea is not working when ControlTemplate is set #25630
  • MAUI Canvas Drawing Slow on Android not iOS #25628
  • Maui Android WebView ShouldOverrideUrlLoading is not calling when we set CustomWebViewClient #25626
  • The version of package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.WindowsForms isn't update to 9.0.0. #25623
  • Error Cannot create an IOS archive . Process cannot be executed on XMA server #25622
  • iOS App Randomly Crashing with Memory Leak During Large Data Load, Navigation, and Save Operations #25621

Closed

  • [0:] Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Element: Warning: The RealParent on Microsoft.Maui.Controls.VerticalStackLayout has been Garbage Collected. #25538
  • [Grid] Using Grid.Resources inside Grid (e.g. for Buttons, Labels, ...) with just some Properties set (e.g. HorizontalOptions or TextAlignment) overwrites global Style entirely #19882
  • Mac catalyst web view is not working #24860
  • Add check for `Shell` so if users try to push to it or not set it as the root we throw a more helpful exception #25423
  • ImageButton wrong size and missing border on Android #25034
  • Only HTTP and HTTPS URLs are supported when opening browser #25625
  • Massive Problems with random crashes (SIGSEGV and SIGABRT) #21479
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid different rendering on different platforms #25464
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Shell Flyout header spacing and dynamic height issue on iOS #25435

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Build maui.aar with the new AndroidGradleProject item #25632
  • Test disabling propagation for ScrollView #25629
    do-not-merge
  • [Android] Toolbar overflow menu icon color #25627
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Testing] Reenable test ported from Xamarin.UITest #25624
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

Merged

  • [main] Merge release 9.0.1xx to main #25589
  • Revert PR #23052 behavior under new app context switch #25613
    do-not-merge, .NET 8 SR9.3
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update some versions for ga #25616
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [Testing] Implement Pinch gestures in UITest extensions methods #25316
    area-testing
  • [Testing] More Appium actions #25569
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #2 #25378
    area-testing

Updated

  • Android: Opt out of edge to edge enforcement on api 35+ #25517
    platform/android 🤖, .NET 9 SR1
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
  • Increment build targets to iOS 18 #25140
    do-not-merge, .NET 8 SR10
  • Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25137
    .NET 8 SR10
  • Add MSBuild glob for Windows Assets #23314
    area-single-project, platform/windows 🪟, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add analyzer for TestCase and missing Category #23465
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #24036
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-flakiness, .NET 9 SR2
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Fix for Single item alignment issue in CollectionView HorizontalGrid Layout #25370
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix for Frame PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #25239
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Entry Height gets updated when loaded inside the RoundRectangle Shape #25166
    area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Fix for span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #25180
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-gestures, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Implement ScrollDownTo and ScrollUpTo methods in Appium #25601
    area-testing
  • Try skip provisionator #25615
  • [X] Delay binding context type check until relative binding source is resolved #25600
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android] SearchHandler - added focus/unfocus support #24852
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Measure invalidation performance and fixes (batching version) #24823
    do-not-merge, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Android] Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-switch
  • For Android, respect Minimum/Maximum size requests even when size is set #25164
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, .NET 9 SR1
  • Add Localization tests #25620
    area-testing, area-localization
  • [Testing] CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled - UI Test #24142
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - UI-Test #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS] BoxView auto scaling not working when layout changes #21955
    area-layout, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Page.IsBusy activity indicators gets stuck/causes multiple to be displayed #23745
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • PullToRefresh & item selection when listView is not enabled [iOS] #20102
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • Facing issues with the Entry, DatePicker, and CheckBox components when applying themes - Fix #21826
    legacy-area-controls, community ✨, area-theme
  • [iOS] Fixed picker title's color #20205
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Relative source binding for gradient stop fix #20287
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Testing] Implement ContextMenu UITest extension methods #25340
    area-testing
  • [iOS] Frames' content update #20501
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-frame
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android] Navigation bar - left margin fix #20967
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Android] Flyout IsGestureEnabled fix #21686
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [iOS] Using long-press navigation on back button - fix #24003
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Pasting long text when the editor has a max length #23877
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Nested Flex Layouts #25036
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, layout-flex
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Android] Reset ListView ScrolledEventArgs.ScrollY when ItemsSource changes #25362
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-listview
  • [iOS] RadioButton throws CGContextSetLineWidth - Fix #25542
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • [iOS] ScrollView's Gradient Background fix #25541
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [Android] Prevent the tap that closes an open SwipeView from being propagated to children #24275
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
